title: LoL Login not working! Need Help!
body:
Okay, yesterday I purchased and installed a new graphics card; an Asus Geforce GTX 750. Once I had installed it and the driver, I went to play League, only to find that the Login screen wouldn't load. I have tried everything I could think of, even reverting back to the original built-in one I was using before, but when I do that, the monitor doesn't even show anything on the screen. If there are any tech wizards out there, I could really use your help.

I know that I have installed the card and the drivers correctly, because I have experimented with games like Spore and Minecraft and their performance has been increased significantly. I would imagine that league would have the same results, but I can't login.

replies.body: Try restarting computer. Same happened to me a while back.

I have done everything I could think off. I even went to the support site and did a bunch of things to my computer's settings that didn't work.

I'm hoping that the update will fix it, but yeah I have tried everything. My ticket is still open after 3 days of no reply so yeah, real problem.
